Title: My Friend, Oscar.
Writer: Brian Kaz, Blake Balu, Brian Kaz (story)
Actors: Blake Balu, Taylor Slade, Luis Q. Barroso, Rebecca L. Frank
Plot: Embrace your weird in this quirky fairy tale about Oscar, a 35 year old mentally challenged man who befriends a socially awkward 12 year old named Sophie only to have a bizarre twist of fate turn their world upside down.
